New Records: Yashasvi Jaiswal scored 93 runs in the match
Key Match Events: Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal's 67-run stand
Pre-Game Insights: Shubman Gill won the toss and decided to bowl first
Zimbabwe's Sikandar Raza was looking to lead from the front
Post-Match Reflections: Sikandar Raza said that India's fielding was the difference in the match
Shubman Gill said that the wicket was a bit double-paced and the new ball was getting some help
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Harare Sports Club in Harare
India sealed the series 3-1 with this win
